resources.string:
Privacy Policy

Sheraz built the Rice Classify app as classification. This SERVICE is provided by Sheraz and is intended for use as is.

Information Collection and Use

The app may collect certain personal information from users. This information is used solely for the purpose of providing and improving the service. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

Types of Data Collected

Personal Information: While using our app, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you ("Personal Data"). Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

Welcome to Rice Classify App!

To use the app, follow these steps:
1. Sign up or log in if you already have an account.
2. Once logged in, go to the Home page.
3. Click on the "Choose Image" button to select an image from the gallery.
4. After selecting the image, click the "Predict" button to classify the rice.
5. The app will provide the prediction result based on the image.
6. You can also explore other options like giving feedback, rating the app, or sharing the app through the navigation drawer.

Enjoy using Rice Classify App! If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to contact us. Email: skumbler5@gmail.com mobile no: +923067145010
